mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SN_Board sb, SN_Member sm WHERE sb.member_no = sm.member_no AND sb.board_no = #{board_no}

SELECT t2.* FROM ( SELECT t1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT sb.* FROM SN_Board sb, SN_Member sm WHERE sb.member_no = sm.member_no
AND sb.board_title LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND sb.board_content LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND sm.member_nick LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
ORDER BY sb.board_no DESC ) t1 ) t2
WHERE t2.rnum >= (#{pageNum}-1) * 6 + 1 AND t2.rnum <= #{pageNum} * 6
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM SN_BoardImage WHERE board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY image_no ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SN_Board sb, SN_Member sm WHERE sb.member_no = sm.member_no
AND sb.board_title LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND sb.board_content LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND sm.member_nick LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
